text:
If you add an horizontal alignment to the image dnd-module
the alignment can be controlled in the CMS
If you add that same horizontal alignment to a text object the control is not showing in the CMS (but the code is there and its align the object)

it’s a strange behavior that you can not explain to a marketer, its aligning due to invisible code that you can not control
<@U017JVCH1FD> is there a specific way to create a stand alone landing page template to upload to the market place? using themes so that they can use the drag and drop editor?

<@U2H3TT8F2> <@U6W3H6YN8> <@U22PKFRU5>
Are there any guides for stand alone landing pages templates with the drag and drop page editor? Or do I have to create a theme and then upload only the landing page to the market place?
Hm, not that I'm aware of. But I'm relatively new so you should ask a few others as well.
